report.title: Indian Tea
report.author: Fungiloop
report.bodytext: This is a recipe for mushroom tea. /n Ingrediants: 2 Cardoman Seeds /n 1 Level Teaspoon of Fennal Seeds /n 2 Cloves (or 4) /n 1/4 Teaspoon of Cinnamon or 4 Pieces /n 1 Tea Bag (any kind will do) /n 3-4 Teaspoons of Sugar /n 1 1/4 Cup of Water /n Milk /n Finely Chopped Mushrooms (use as many as you like) /n Preparation: First crush seeds and cloves. Then add the seeds, cloves and mushrooms to the water. Bring to a boil, then add the tea bag and the milk. Use only enough milk to turn the color to a light beige. Wait until that boils then add the sugar and continue to boil for another 2-3 min. Strain. Makes 1 cup.
